task.name: ORG span extraction
task.description: Extract ORG entity spans from the input context. Return character-based spans with start/end offsets into the original context.

rules.name: Extract Organization Names with Specific Keywords
rules.description: This rule captures organization names that have specific common keywords associated with companies like 'AG', 'Bank', 'Group'.

rules.name: Capture Multi-Word Organizations
rules.description: This rule identifies organizations that might consist of multiple words together, ensuring a group of words that typically form a name are captured together.

rules.name: Incorporate Variations in Entity Reference
rules.description: This handles literal variations in how organizations may reference themselves in texts, such as shortening or acronyms.

rules.name: Exclude Non-Organization Context
rules.description: This rule avoids capturing spans when the identified text does not form a meaningful organization context.
rules.content:
def extract(input_data):
    import re
    spans = []
    context = input_data['context']
    # Regex to find potential organizations
    pattern = re.compile(r'((?:[A-ZÄÖÜ][a-zäöüß]+(?: [a-zäöüß]+)*) (?:AG|Bank|Group|GmbH|Inc\.|LLC|PLC))|(?:\b[A-Z]{2,}\b)')
    matches = pattern.finditer(context)
    for match in matches:
        start, end = match.span()  # Get start and end indices
        spans.append({'text': match.group(), 'start': start, 'end': end})
    return spans

rules.name: Handle Non-Organization Texts Gracefully
rules.description: This rule is to ensure that if no organizations are present, an empty list is returned, minimizing errors in output.

rules.name: Detect Organizations with Local Context
rules.description: This rule helps in identifying organizations that may have local or geographic identifiers that are often appended.

rules.name: Filter Out Generic Terms
rules.description: This relates to ignoring generic terms that might be confused for organizations.

rules.name: Utilize Contextual Analysis
rules.description: This rule allows examining the surrounding texts of potential organization matches to validate their relevance and context.

rules.name: Minimal Capture Pattern for Organizations
rules.description: A fallback regex that captures very basic organization structures in case other rules fail.

rules.name: Adapt to Regional Language Variants
rules.description: This handles cases where organization names may include language specific characters or structures.
